searchDurInCartTree

public double searchDurInCartTree(HTSModel m,
                                  FeatureVector fv,
                                  HMMData htsData,
                                  double diffdur)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Searches fv in durTree CART[] set of trees, per state, and fill the information in the HTSModel m.

Parameters:
m - HTSModel where mean and variances per state are copied
fv - context feature vector
htsData - HMMData with configuration settings
Returns:
duration
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
